recipesJson.name: Strawberry Milk v2
recipesJson.author: pierceshawn
recipesJson.description: Just a nice full flavor strawberry that I've been looking for forever like anyone that does diy this is what I'm chasing almost there with this one. I used another recipe as a base don't remember who's can't find it but I've changed enough that it's quite different.

reviews.text:
Seems to be based on Strawberry Milks by thedirtyprojector.
https://www.reddit.com/r/DIY_eJuice/comments/4vkvui/strawberry_milks_a_recipe_born_out_of_nostalgia/
